message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value, I propose a starting price of $11,500.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the product's value, but $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $11,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,750.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to compromise. My counteroffer for the product is $10,900.
